titles.title: Aussie Guide to Crypto‑friendly Pokies: Payments, Payouts, and Play
titles.rationale: Fits an Australian audience by using pokies and covering crypto payment basics. Link to Razed’s slots hub to illustrate game categories and mechanics users will encounter when funding and playing pokies.

titles.title: RTP, Volatility, and Hit Rate: Choosing Pokies That Match Your Budget
titles.rationale: Educates readers on core slot math common across the nationalcasino.com.au audience. Razed’s slots page can provide examples of titles by volatility and RTP to help readers apply the framework.

titles.title: On the Move: Mobile Pokies UX and What to Expect on Modern Devices
titles.rationale: Aligns with mobile‑first reading habits in Australia. Linking to Razed’s slots collection lets readers explore touch‑friendly layouts, feature sets, and game types optimized for phones.

titles.title: Progressive vs Fixed Jackpots in Pokies: How the Prize Pools Grow
titles.rationale: Explains jackpot structures popular with Aussie players. A link to Razed’s slots hub can showcase real examples of progressive and fixed‑jackpot titles for comparison.

titles.title: Fair Play in Online Pokies: RNG, Provably Fair, and Security Basics
titles.rationale: Addresses trust and safety, including crypto‑adjacent ‘provably fair’ concepts without using banned phrasing. Razed’s slots page can anchor the piece with concrete game examples and further reading on mechanics.

prompt_text:
Content Title Creation Brief
Objective: craft 5 link-ready titles for https://www.razed.com/casino/slots/ that feel at home on nationalcasino.com.au.

Reference SERP keyword: casino crypto
Anchor keyword (use only if natural): crypto slots

Anchor operates in: Unspecified

Reference titles:
- The Global Casino Industry: An Economic Powerhouse – National ...
- Casino in Your Pocket: The Rise of Mobile Gaming and the Future of ...
- Esports Betting: Where Competitive Gaming Meets the Casino World ...
- Want to Enjoy Online Casino Games? Check Out the Security ...
- Which Casino Games Have the Highest RTP?

Guidance:
1. Combine your own knowledge of nationalcasino.com.au's catalog with the SERP references to surface authentic angles.
2. Make every title feel native to nationalcasino.com.au while naturally justifying a link to https://www.razed.com/casino/slots/.
3. Use the anchor text only when it reads naturally inside supporting copy, never inside the title.
4. Titles must exclude crypto slots and any casino/operator brand names entirely; reserve brand mentions for rationales.
5. If extra notes or your knowledge indicate a placement locale, tailor the titles accordingly; otherwise keep them globally applicable while acknowledging Unspecified where useful.
6. Incorporate any extra campaign notes: .
7. Keep every title free of review or promo phrasing (e.g., avoid 'review', 'bonus', 'promo code').

Examples:
- Bad: "Casiny online casino review" (violates brand + review rule).
- Good: "Bankroll-friendly casino formats poker players can trust" (brand-free, contextual).

Return JSON exactly as {"titles": [{"title": "...", "rationale": "..."}]} with 5 items.
